body_html:
Everything up to conversion to markdown is already open-source, you can easily generate html from that using hoedown or other md interpreters (tools/docs).

For the "last mile" we use an internal system, and we will not try to replace it with an open-source version.
body_text:
Everything up to conversion to markdown is already open-source, you can easily generate html from that using hoedown or other md interpreters (tools/docs).
For the "last mile" we use an internal system, and we will not try to replace it with an open-source version.
body:
Everything up to conversion to markdown is already open-source, you can easily generate html from that using hoedown or other md interpreters (tools/docs).

For the "last mile" we use an internal system, and we will not try to replace it with an open-source version.
